bibdata.title: An overview of the development of technical infrastructure in the Asia-Pacific region: the work of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC), Sub-Committee on Standards and Conformance (SCSC) and the Specialist Regional Bodies (SRBs)
